definitions.title: n.f.
definitions.body: deep darkness (= [[מַאֲפֵל יׇהּ]] acc. to Thes MV cf. Ct So 8:6 [[שַׁלְהֶבֶתְיָה]]; but EW:§ 165 b & on Je 2:31 rds. [[מַאְפִּלִיָה]] fem. of [[[מאפלי]]], der. fr. Hiph. Pt. ; cf. Sta:§ 302 b [[מַאְפְּלִיָּה]]; Jäger:BAS 471 thinks this [[יׇה]] an enclitic part. of emphasis, & camp. As.)—only ´[[אֶרֶץ מ]] Je 2:31 fig. of ´[[י]] in dealing with his people (‖[[מִרְבָּר]]).
